data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: When there is not enough RAM to store all the running programs, an area of the hard drive will be assigned as 'virtual memory'. Programs ____ have ____ inactive ____ the ____ will ____ stored ____, ____ loaded ____ into ____ RAM ____ needed. This allows a computer to multi-task using more, or bigger, programs than would normally be possible.
data.partBlankContent: When there is not enough RAM to store all the running programs, an area of the hard drive will be assigned as 'virtual memory'. Programs th__ have be__ inactive f__ the lon____ will b_ stored he__, th__ loaded ba__ into t__ RAM wh__ needed. This allows a computer to multi-task using more, or bigger, programs than would normally be possible.
data.fullContent: When there is not enough RAM to store all the running programs, an area of the hard drive will be assigned as 'virtual memory'. Programs that have been inactive for the longest will be stored here, then loaded back into the RAM when needed. This allows a computer to multi-task using more, or bigger, programs than would normally be possible.
data.answer: 当没有足够的内存来存储所有运行的程序时，硬盘的一个区域将被分配为“虚拟内存”。长时间处于非活动状态的程序将存储在这里，然后在需要时重新加载到内存中。这使得计算机能够使用比通常可能使用的更多或更大的程序进行多任务处理。
